metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: Document your skills Improve your career
Study at your own pace Save time and money
Known brand Trusted by top companies
Who Should Consider Getting Certified?
Any student or professional within the digital industry.
content.html: Any student or professional within the digital industry.

content.text: Certifications are valuable assets to gain trust and demonstrate knowledge to your clients, current or future employers on a ever increasing competitive market.
content.html: Certifications are valuable assets to gain trust and demonstrate knowledge to your clients, current or future employers on a ever increasing competitive market.

content.text: W3Schools is Trusted by Top Companies
W3Schools has over two decades of experience with teaching coding online.
content.html: W3Schools has over two decades of experience with teaching coding online.

content.text: Our certificates are recognized and valued by companies looking to employ skilled developers.
content.html: Our certificates are recognized and valued by companies looking to employ skilled developers.

content.text: Save Time and Money
Show the world your coding skills by getting a certification.
content.html: Show the world your coding skills by getting a certification.

content.text: The prices is a small fraction compared to the price of traditional education.
content.html: The prices is a small fraction compared to the price of traditional education.

content.text: Document and validate your competence by getting certified!

content.text: Advance Faster in Your Career
Getting a certificate proves your commitment to upgrading your skills.
content.html: Getting a certificate proves your commitment to upgrading your skills.

content.text: The certificate can be added as credentials to your CV, Resume, LinkedIn profile, and so on.

content.text: It gives you the credibility needed for more responsibilities, larger projects, and a higher salary.

content.text: Knowledge is power, especially in the current job market.
